page.title: 11YOUTH HOSTEL.
page.content: There is only one{Youth Hostel}in Oxford, and it is situated at{No.32} {Jack Straws Lane, Marston.} It rose from humble beginnings in the year{1850,}but nowadays{116}people can be accommodated, and there is even extra space for camping in the garden. Meals can be purchased from the Hostel, or the people who are staying can cook for themselves. From{5:00pm}until{11:00pm}at night, the{eleven dormitories}are available, but the occupants must be out by {10:00am.} The hostel is classed as{"Standard",} which is one of four grades given to all Youth Hostels.{(Simple, standard,} {superior or special)} If you wished to stay at this hostel then prices would range from{Â£2-Â£3} depending upon your age.
